LABEL: 0x2C2
STRING: <COOS> was light that possessed intelligence――

LABEL: 0x2EA
STRING: Therefore, it couldn't be eradicated simply because it was a threat to humans.

LABEL: 0x336
STRING: It was akin to how highly intelligent monkeys and whales were granted rights.

LABEL: 0x38A
STRING: As long as one possessed intelligence, their life must not be taken indiscriminately.

LABEL: 0x3C8
STRING: Reiri's story was starting to make a lot of sense.

LABEL: 0x402
STRING: But how was it possible for light to be intelligent?

LABEL: 0x436
STRING: Was that really possible for diminutive beings near the level of bacteria?

LABEL: 0x503
STRING: We were all waiting for Yukari to speak up again.

LABEL: 0x537
STRING: Her astonished expression soon faded, and she nodded her head in silence.

LABEL: 0x60D
STRING: 「<COOS> forms a network...」

LABEL: 0x643
STRING: 「And by transmitting light through that network, it has a collective will.」

LABEL: 0x698
STRING: 「Transmitting light...?」

LABEL: 0x6C7
STRING: 「That's right. <COOS> has magnetosomes.」

LABEL: 0x6FD
STRING: 「In other words, it produces light in exchange for electromagnetic force.」

LABEL: 0x749
STRING: 「That network is a replica of the structure of human consciousness.」

LABEL: 0x789
STRING: 「Neurons alone have no meaning,

LABEL: 0x7BF
STRING: but when they come together to form a network and exchange light, humans become "conscious."」

LABEL: 0x886
STRING: 「However, instead of neurons, <COOS> uses other living beings.」

LABEL: 0x8E3
STRING: It possessed, hijacked, and used other organisms to gain consciousness.

LABEL: 0x925
STRING: Yukari no longer questioned how Reiri knew that.

LABEL: 0x969
STRING: She simply listened carefully to what she had to say.

LABEL: 0x9A1
STRING: What was the intent behind her words?

LABEL: 0x9CB
STRING: To accuse ROMLES?

LABEL: 0x9EF
STRING: To uncover the truth?

LABEL: 0xA13
STRING: But for what?

LABEL: 0xA35
STRING: What in the world was Reiri trying to tell us?

LABEL: 0xA86
STRING: 「But, how were they able to reproduce so explosively in the deep sea?」

LABEL: 0xB06
STRING: 「Because of the depth.」

LABEL: 0xB32
STRING: 「It's easy to imagine, right?」

LABEL: 0xB69
STRING: Reiri turned her attention to Tokiwa in a provocative manner.

LABEL: 0xB97
STRING: How she dared to address her after their exchange over the sea spiders was beyond me.

LABEL: 0xBE9
STRING: Reiri's chin was raised as she looked condescendingly at her.

LABEL: 0xC19
STRING: On the other hand, Tokiwa was undaunted by her obviously insolent attitude and looked straight at her.

LABEL: 0xC73
STRING: But... what was reflected in her eyes was no longer the anger from earlier.

LABEL: 0xD23
STRING: 「Have you ever heard of a parasite called leucochloridium?」

LABEL: 0xD67
STRING: 「They use birds as hosts, but they use unusual methods to parasitize them.」

LABEL: 0xDC5
STRING: 「They will enter a snail's body...」

LABEL: 0xE01
STRING: 「They then control the snail to imitate a caterpillar, which birds prey upon,

LABEL: 0xE69
STRING: and will eventually get eaten by one.」

LABEL: 0xEA4
STRING: They possessed and controlled the snail until it got preyed upon.

LABEL: 0xEDE
STRING: They altered the snail's behavior in order to make it seem like a better prey, and――

LABEL: 0xF30
STRING: By getting preyed upon, they would make their way to their new host, the predator.

LABEL: 0x1018
STRING: 「Ugh――」

LABEL: 0x103B
STRING: The cruel story made Touri crouch down where she stood, holding her mouth.

LABEL: 0x1089
STRING: A life that was meant to die. A life to be preyed upon.

LABEL: 0x10B9
STRING: Nature's livestock.

LABEL: 0x10D3
STRING: Controlling a life for that purpose――Wasn't that just slaughter?

LABEL: 0x111F
STRING: Tokiwa continued.

LABEL: 0x123E
STRING: 「I imagine it's the same thing with <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x1278
STRING: 「Why do anglerfish use bioluminescence?」

LABEL: 0x12C4
STRING: 「――It's to lure other fish to them.」

LABEL: 0x12F0
STRING: 「They use their light as a kind of bait.」

LABEL: 0x1326
STRING: 「Taking that into consideration, you can see how luminescence would be appealing to deep-sea predators.」

LABEL: 0x13E1
STRING: 「Organisms infected by <COOS> emit light.」

LABEL: 0x1419
STRING: 「If the purpose of <COOS> is to multiply and reproduce through a succession of hosts――」

LABEL: 0x146F
STRING: 「Then it's not just a trait to deceive predators.」

LABEL: 0x14B1
STRING: 「In which case, isn't the light <COOS> emits for the purpose of "being preyed upon...?"」

LABEL: 0x1500
STRING: 「Impressive.」

LABEL: 0x1537
STRING: Reiri nodded her head slightly.

LABEL: 0x15C3
STRING: 「After infecting an organism, it immediately moves directly under the surface of the host's body. By emitting light, it then makes the host vulnerable to predation.」

LABEL: 0x162F
STRING: 「Using that method, <COOS> is able to climb up the food chain.」

LABEL: 0x167D
STRING: 「And by continuously expanding in that manner, it uses the entire surrounding ecosystem as a host and for its own network.」

LABEL: 0x16DF
STRING: 「That is how <COOS> works.」

LABEL: 0x170E
STRING: Everyone present was overwhelmed by her powerful declaration.

LABEL: 0x174C
STRING: <COOS> parasitized entire ecosystems and brought them under its control―even though it was only light.

LABEL: 0x179E
STRING: It sounded absurd, but in reality――

LABEL: 0x18AB
STRING: 「...So, it transforms into a network.」

LABEL: 0x18DB
STRING: 「Is that really possible?」

LABEL: 0x196A
STRING: 「It's different from parasitizing a single host.」

LABEL: 0x19A3
STRING: 「Controlling the host's behavior... It sounds like science fiction.」

LABEL: 0x19E7
STRING: 「It's different from changing its appearance, like making it glow.」

LABEL: 0x1A37
STRING: 「I can't believe that something as complicated as that is possible for such as... diminutive being.」

LABEL: 0x1A8B
STRING: I didn't doubt Reiri's words.

LABEL: 0x1ADB
STRING: Well, I didn't believe that all of it was true, but...

LABEL: 0x1B15
STRING: I just had a hard time deciding whether to trust her in the first place.

LABEL: 0x1B59
STRING: I didn't fully understand her point.

LABEL: 0x1B8B
STRING: Did we not yet fully comprehend the threat of <COOS>, or how terrifying it was――

LABEL: 0x1C51
STRING: 「That's a good point.」

LABEL: 0x1C6D
STRING: 「They use a particular protein that living beings possess to synchronize their network.」

LABEL: 0x1CD3
STRING: 「Something called cryptochromes...」

LABEL: 0x1D8D
STRING: 「Sound familiar? ...Well, that doesn't mean you know about it, does it?」

LABEL: 0x1DEC
STRING: Reiri cast a sidelong glance at Tokiwa as she spoke.

LABEL: 0x1E1C
STRING: It was true that Tokiwa possessed a wide range of knowledge and accomplishments beyond her specialty―namely physics―but what did Reiri mean by "familiar?"

LABEL: 0x1EF6
STRING: 「Don't make light of me.」

LABEL: 0x1F18
STRING: 「It's a blue light receptor protein.」

LABEL: 0x1F40
STRING: 「Also known as... Cry.」

LABEL: 0x1F5D
STRING: 「It's a protein that governs most plants' and animals' internal clocks.」

LABEL: 0x1FA5
STRING: 「Cryptochromes, as the name implies, act when exposed to light of a specific wavelength,

LABEL: 0x1FF5
STRING: and switch on the genes involved in the body's internal clock....」

LABEL: 0x2048
STRING: 「That's right. <COOS> utilizes the body's internal clock feedback mechanism, which is inherent to living organisms.」

LABEL: 0x2123
STRING: 「It might be easier for Katagiri, who majored in information technology, to understand, but...」

LABEL: 0x216D
STRING: 「The word "network" may generally conjure up images of something spatial, but essentially it extends over time and space.」

LABEL: 0x21E5
STRING: 「Without a time axis, there can be no network. The causality of information transmission would collapse.」

LABEL: 0x2249
STRING: 「In other words――」

LABEL: 0x2265
STRING: 「It's because each node has a common "clock" that the network is established.」

LABEL: 0x22DE
STRING: When it came to the transmission of information, it was an important factor to determine the source and destination, what data to send, and in what order.

LABEL: 0x234A
STRING: That timeline and order were what you'd call a flow.

LABEL: 0x238E
STRING: Controlling that was definitely a major part in building networks.

LABEL: 0x23EF
STRING: 「<COOS> hacks the ecosystem using Cry as a foothold.」

LABEL: 0x2446
STRING: 「And then... <Alice> knocks out that Cry.」

LABEL: 0x248E
STRING: So that's how <Alice> factored in...!

LABEL: 0x24B4
STRING: Tokiwa was the older sister of an <Alice>-carrier, Hikari.

LABEL: 0x24EC
STRING: It was perfectly natural for her to be familiar with Cry.

LABEL: 0x259F
STRING: 「...You develop a sleeping disorder when infected with <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x25D9
STRING: 「It's thought to be caused by the loss of genes related to the body's internal clock.」

LABEL: 0x2630
STRING: <COOS> and <Alice> were connected by clock genes――

LABEL: 0x2670
STRING: There was no way these two threats that had appeared in the same place and at the same time were unrelated.

LABEL: 0x26BC
STRING: The reason why ROMLES valued <Alice> so much was because of the problem <COOS> posed...

LABEL: 0x27E8
STRING: 「Why <Alice> is such an important research subject for ROMLES――」

LABEL: 0x288B
STRING: 「You understand now, don't you?」

LABEL: 0x28AB
STRING: 「There's no other virus that selectively knocks out only the clock genes.」

LABEL: 0x2910
STRING: 「Yes... There was another objective the <SHEEP III> was tasked with...」

LABEL: 0x2949
STRING: 「The search for <Alice's> natural host, which is believed to reside here in Kurama Bay, but has yet to be discovered.」

LABEL: 0x29C6
STRING: 「Search for its natural host, huh...」

LABEL: 0x29EE
STRING: 「I wonder how meaningful ROMLES really thinks that is...」

LABEL: 0x2A9D
STRING: 「They seem pretty carefree about all this.」

LABEL: 0x2AEB
STRING: Reiri spat out the words in a bored tone.

LABEL: 0x2B83
STRING: 「At most, what ROMLES is trying to do is prevent the spread of <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x2BE1
STRING: 「――They don't actually understand <COOS> at all.」

LABEL: 0x2C5C
STRING: She held up an empty ampule and shook it slowly.

LABEL: 0x2C96
STRING: What was she seeing inside it, I wondered――

LABEL: 0x2D56
STRING: 「Again, <COOS> is a network.」

LABEL: 0x2D8A
STRING: 「If ones and zeros are expressed through light... information is created.」

LABEL: 0x2DCE
STRING: 「<COOS> will not die.」

LABEL: 0x2DF4
STRING: 「However, <Alice> can control it.」

LABEL: 0x2E28
STRING: 「<Alice> is able to intervene in the <COOS> network, extract, and even rewrite its information.」

LABEL: 0x2EF3
STRING: 「I'm sure you understand where I'm going with this by now, right?」

LABEL: 0x2F36
STRING: <COOS> built a network using the whole surrounding ecosystem.

LABEL: 0x2F76
STRING: If you were able to recall and rewrite the data within using <Alice>,

LABEL: 0x2FD8
STRING: then――

LABEL: 0x2FFF
STRING: 「Reiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x301D
STRING: 「Is that... what you wanted to do?」

LABEL: 0x30C9
STRING: 「You got a problem with that?」

LABEL: 0x30FA
STRING: 「I do.」

LABEL: 0x3121
STRING: Tokiwa was the one who raised her voice.

LABEL: 0x314D
STRING: Her face was expressionless... but there was something thorny about her tone.

LABEL: 0x3256
STRING: 「Is that the extent of it?」

LABEL: 0x327C
STRING: 「You went all this way for that?」

LABEL: 0x32BE
STRING: 「What, are you going to make a computer out of these sea spiders?」

LABEL: 0x32F2
STRING: 「A crab-based computer was already made over 20 years ago.」

LABEL: 0x333C
STRING: 「The idea of biological computers is already an old one.」

LABEL: 0x3384
STRING: 「How much more do you intend to mock the dignity of living beings?」

LABEL: 0x33DB
STRING: Tokiwa was... angry.

LABEL: 0x3401
STRING: Her calm tone of voice hadn't changed, but there was no hiding it.

LABEL: 0x344D
STRING: She probably had no intention of hiding it, either.

LABEL: 0x3475
STRING: Despite her tone, she exuded a fiery anger toward Reiri.

LABEL: 0x3523
STRING: 「You still don't get it.」

LABEL: 0x3558
STRING: Reiri whispered with a hint of loneliness in her voice.

LABEL: 0x3582
STRING: Was it the sadness of losing someone who understood her, or pity toward Tokiwa, who didn't understand...?

LABEL: 0x35E1
STRING: 「...You don't understand the value of anything.」

LABEL: 0x3649
STRING: 「It's thanks to your cognitive ability that you're able to trivialize <COOS> in such a way.」

LABEL: 0x3695
STRING: 「<COOS> was first confirmed to exist at the end of the 19th century.」

LABEL: 0x3734
STRING: 「Afterward... it disappeared for a time.」

LABEL: 0x376C
STRING: 「Specifically, it happened in November 1883. The entire <COOS> network simultaneously emitted light and disappeared.」

LABEL: 0x37D0
STRING: 「Afterward, light was observed in the direction of Deneb Cygnus.」

LABEL: 0x3812
STRING: 「With the technology available at the time, it wasn't known then what it was, but...」

LABEL: 0x3866
STRING: 「It was the same――」

LABEL: 0x3882
STRING: 「April 4th, 2026.」

LABEL: 0x38A0
STRING: 「A few days before that, <COOS> began to emit light.」

LABEL: 0x38DC
STRING: 「That was how the "Fourth Day" came to be――」

LABEL: 0x396D
STRING: 「Even a monkey should be able to get it at this point.」

LABEL: 0x39A6
STRING: Reiri quietly averted her eyes.

LABEL: 0x3A48
STRING: 「...I see. You wouldn't know, would you?」

LABEL: 0x3A80
STRING: 「The "Fourth Day"――Betelgeuse's supernova explosion.」

LABEL: 0x3ABA
STRING: 「And the many tragic accidents it gave birth to...」

LABEL: 0x3B58
STRING: 「Betelgeuse――」

LABEL: 0x3BB9
STRING: She stopped mid-sentence.

LABEL: 0x3BDB
STRING: Tokiwa's eyes widened as if she had realized something.

LABEL: 0x3C1B
STRING: Reiri grinned.

LABEL: 0x3CA9
STRING: 「The light of <COOS> is synchronized with celestial activity.」

LABEL: 0x3CE1
STRING: 「It's here at the depths of the sea, yet it contains information about the universe.」

LABEL: 0x3D1F
STRING: 「The Colour Out Of Space... Truly a fitting name.」

LABEL: 0x3D74
STRING: 「So, the information <COOS> holds is about the universe――」

LABEL: 0x3DBD
STRING: 「It's a piece of information that transcends human knowledge, and is close to the truth of the world.」

LABEL: 0x3E58
STRING: 「At last, I have control over it!」

LABEL: 0x3E8A
STRING: 「By using <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x3EB4
STRING: 「For the first time... I've succeeded in taking it out for the first time!」

LABEL: 0x3EFB
STRING: Reiri made her declaration in high spirits.

LABEL: 0x3F23
STRING: Shouting.

LABEL: 0x3F39
STRING: She sounded like she might just disappear if her hoarse voice got any louder.

LABEL: 0x3F8D
STRING: Her loud voice――

LABEL: 0x3FB3
STRING: It was as if a great curtain hanging from the heavens was being torn apart.

LABEL: 0x3FF7
STRING: With a rattle, it echoed through my ears all the way to my heart.

LABEL: 0x402B
STRING: Yukari, Hiragino, and even her own sister, Touri, could only watch her in silence.

LABEL: 0x411A
STRING: Insanity――

LABEL: 0x4130
STRING: I had no words in the presence of such abnormality, which could only be described as such.

LABEL: 0x4184
STRING: However, she was different.

LABEL: 0x4319
STRING: 「Where did you get <Alice> from?」

LABEL: 0x43C3
STRING: 「From your sister――」

LABEL: 0x44CD
STRING: ――In an instant.

LABEL: 0x44E5
STRING: The sleeves of her kimono fluttered.

LABEL: 0x4507
STRING: There was a loud noise.

LABEL: 0x4531
STRING: And by the time I realized it, it was all over.

LABEL: 0x4599
STRING: Tokiwa had swung her arm.

LABEL: 0x45BD
STRING: Her sleeves fluttered quietly, as if following the motion of her hand.

LABEL: 0x45EB
STRING: Reiri's cheek was tinted red like it was about to burst.

LABEL: 0x476E
STRING: 「...Everything was connected.」

LABEL: 0x4796
STRING: 「Why was she on this ship?」

LABEL: 0x47D6
STRING: 「It was too convenient...」

LABEL: 0x480D
STRING: 「Very perceptive.」

LABEL: 0x4884
STRING: 「I freed her from her cage.」

LABEL: 0x48BD
STRING: Even so, Reiri――

LABEL: 0x48DD
STRING: She cheerfully faced the grimacing Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x491E
STRING: 「She wanted to see the sea.」

LABEL: 0x4948
STRING: 「That's why she was brought here.」

LABEL: 0x4985
STRING: 「You hypocritical――」

LABEL: 0x4A19
STRING: 「That's a cheap word.」

LABEL: 0x4A3A
STRING: I was cut off by her single comment.

LABEL: 0x4A6A
STRING: My words, my thoughts, were too cheap.

LABEL: 0x4B02
STRING: 「Every rational being mustn't treat themselves or others merely as means,

LABEL: 0x4B56
STRING: but always and simultaneously as an end in itself.」

LABEL: 0x4B92
STRING: 「You only wanted to use her as a tool.」

LABEL: 0x4C44
STRING: 「――And what if I did?」

LABEL: 0x4C7D
STRING: 「Unforgivable.」

LABEL: 0x4C9E
STRING: Hikari was just used as a tool.

LABEL: 0x4CCA
STRING: Not as a person with a will of her own, but simply as <Alice's> carrier.

LABEL: 0x4D20
STRING: It was similar to how Tokiwa was treated solely based on the fact that she was a genius.

LABEL: 0x4D60
STRING: She was used by ROMLES as a person without a will of her own...

LABEL: 0x4D9E
STRING: As someone without a human heart, an arithmetic machine that didn't factor in good or evil.

LABEL: 0x4DE0
STRING: There was no way she could forgive her own sister being treated the same way she was.

LABEL: 0x4E2A
STRING: Reiri faced her anger head-on.

LABEL: 0x4ECE
STRING: 「People live by using others.」

LABEL: 0x4EFC
STRING: 「Just as <COOS> uses other living beings.」

LABEL: 0x4FA8
STRING: 「Those two aren't――」

LABEL: 0x5038
STRING: 「Am I wrong? I think it's just a difference in layers.」

LABEL: 0x507E
STRING: 「The root of value is in the transaction.」

LABEL: 0x50A6
STRING: 「Liquidity is a device that facilitates barter.」

LABEL: 0x50DA
STRING: 「The reason you sisters are valued in this world is because of your rare talents and usefulness, right?」

LABEL: 0x5136
STRING: 「Don't dream of being self-sufficient without being used by anyone.」

LABEL: 0x51E3
STRING: 「That goes especially for people like you and me, who aren't allowed to do that.」

LABEL: 0x5261
STRING: People like you and me――

LABEL: 0x5285
STRING: I could only speculate as to what she was referring to.

LABEL: 0x5359
STRING: A rare talent and pathology.

LABEL: 0x5383
STRING: She was viewed as a value generator and controlled as such.

LABEL: 0x53C5
STRING: "Control" sounded bad, but the reality of the situation shouldn't have gone against her humanity.

LABEL: 0x5429
STRING: In other words, she had received excessive treatment in a way―like someone taming a rare creature.

LABEL: 0x5473
STRING: ――That couldn't have been by choice.

LABEL: 0x550C
STRING: It was the transcendence she'd been born with,

LABEL: 0x5544
STRING: or perhaps something that had triggered her to obtain it.

LABEL: 0x5594
STRING: Her surroundings responded to that transcendence, but...

LABEL: 0x55C6
STRING: For example, could Hikari have lived without being under ROMLES' control?

LABEL: 0x5699
STRING: For example, could Tokiwa have lived without being used by the appropriate institutions?

LABEL: 0x56F5
STRING: For example, could Reiri have lived without being on the proper medication?

LABEL: 0x5745
STRING: No one could live without being influenced by someone else's intentions.

LABEL: 0x578F
STRING: They would be without anyone to lean on, without anyone to take advantage of.

LABEL: 0x57E1
STRING: There would be no one to take advantage of them in exchange for something else.

LABEL: 0x5887
STRING: That was an unsustainable existence.

LABEL: 0x58AF
STRING: Her dramatic words contained a single truth.

LABEL: 0x59EE
STRING: 「And... if anything, you should be thanking me.」

LABEL: 0x5A8B
STRING: 「I may have saved her life.」

LABEL: 0x5AC8
STRING: As everyone mulled over her words, Reiri continued.

LABEL: 0x5B06
STRING: 「...Do you mean that you freed her from ROMLES' control?」

LABEL: 0x5BB8
STRING: 「I meant it more directly.」

LABEL: 0x5BDE
STRING: 「I told you, didn't I?」

LABEL: 0x5BFE
STRING: 「<COOS> is synchronized to astral movements.」

LABEL: 0x5C2A
STRING: 「...You haven't forgotten the abnormal luminescence from earlier, have you?」

LABEL: 0x5C75
STRING: 「Luminescence...」

LABEL: 0x5CAB
STRING: The "Fourth Day"――

LABEL: 0x5CC9
STRING: The Aqualine accident――

LABEL: 0x5CFA
STRING: 「That's right...」

LABEL: 0x5D71
STRING: 「Something is definitely happening.」

LABEL: 0x5E6C
STRING: 「...Even knowing that, you――」

LABEL: 0x5E9E
STRING: 「Comms!」

LABEL: 0x5EB8
STRING: 「We have to contact the surface right now! Get the communications back up!」

LABEL: 0x5EFB
STRING: Yukari closed in on Reiri like she was about to grapple her.

LABEL: 0x5F29
STRING: Her eyes locked with Reiri, who was looking down on her insolently.

LABEL: 0x60C6
STRING: 「...Very well. I have no reason to refuse now.」

LABEL: 0x618B
STRING: As soon as we returned to the library, Reiri went to the computer.

LABEL: 0x61CB
STRING: Her slender fingers gently brushed against the keyboard.

LABEL: 0x61FB
STRING: It happened quickly.

LABEL: 0x62CD
STRING: She operated the countless windows that popped up one after the other and disappeared just as fast.

LABEL: 0x6325
STRING: This was Reiri's... true――

LABEL: 0x634F
STRING: In the blink of an eye, she had deactivated all the settings.

LABEL: 0x63F7
STRING: Yukari dashed to the wheelhouse after confirming it herself.

LABEL: 0x652A
STRING: 「――It's connected!」

LABEL: 0x6548
STRING: 「I'll contact them right away!!」

LABEL: 0x65A0
STRING: Yukari continued her efforts to call the surface.

LABEL: 0x65E5
STRING: She continuously sent out a signal.

LABEL: 0x661C
STRING: There was nothing blocking us from the surface.

LABEL: 0x6661
STRING: There were no problems anymore.

LABEL: 0x6698
STRING: This time we could call for help.

LABEL: 0x66E0
STRING: But――

LABEL: 0x66F8
STRING: Even so.

LABEL: 0x67F9
STRING: 「Why?!」

LABEL: 0x681E
STRING: The communications should have been restored.

LABEL: 0x6844
STRING: But――there was no response.

LABEL: 0x692D
STRING: Yukari slammed her hands on the control panel.

LABEL: 0x6959
STRING: The sturdy equipment of the <SHEEP III> would never be damaged by something like that.

LABEL: 0x69A2
STRING: Some errors rang out in response.

LABEL: 0x69CC
STRING: There were no problems, yet there was no response.

LABEL: 0x6A2D
STRING: 「Did... something happen on the surface...?」

LABEL: 0x6A62
STRING: There was nothing to be done about the silent transmission.

LABEL: 0x6A90
STRING: Yukari was whispering to no one in particular, and her voice echoed through the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x6AC6
STRING: There were no more obstacles on our side.

LABEL: 0x6AFB
STRING: The system was capable of sending and receiving signals to and from the surface without any issues...

LABEL: 0x6B41
STRING: And yet, the fact that we couldn't get in touch with them meant――

LABEL: 0x6BE9
STRING: 「The "Fourth Day"――」

LABEL: 0x6C0B
STRING: 「I'm sure you haven't forgotten what happened that day.」

LABEL: 0x6C5A
STRING: 「Don't tell me――」

LABEL: 0x6CE2
STRING: 「It's probably something similar.」

LABEL: 0x6DBF
STRING: The Fourth Day.

LABEL: 0x6DD9
STRING: What had happened that day?

LABEL: 0x6E01
STRING: It was a disaster that could never be forgotten.

LABEL: 0x6E35
STRING: I couldn't believe that something like that was happening again on the surface――

LABEL: 0x6E75
STRING: Under those circumstances, searching for a sunken ship in the deep sea would be...

LABEL: 0x6FCD
STRING: A girl timidly raised her hand inside the silent wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x7005
STRING: Her expression was less dubious and more anxious.

LABEL: 0x7039
STRING: 「What is it, Tokiwa?」

LABEL: 0x70C9
STRING: 「...Could someone fill me in?」

LABEL: 0x70F9
STRING: 「You know... about this "Fourth Day" you've been talking about for a while now.」

LABEL: 0x714C
STRING: Yukari's eyes widened in surprise... It was a natural reaction.

LABEL: 0x7178
STRING: How could she not know about that disaster――

LABEL: 0x71AE
STRING: It was hard to believe something like that.

LABEL: 0x72BD
STRING: 「Do you... really not know?」

LABEL: 0x72F1
STRING: 「It's already been seven years since then...!」

LABEL: 0x739D
STRING: 「Seven years ago... 2026?」

LABEL: 0x73C5
STRING: 「I spent a lot of that time locked away, doing research.」

LABEL: 0x7413
STRING: 「――In a place isolated from the rest of the world.」

LABEL: 0x7441
STRING: 「So, no matter how big the news was, it's not a surprise that it wouldn't reach my ears.」

LABEL: 0x749E
STRING: Tokiwa stayed calm without breaking her pace.

LABEL: 0x74DA
STRING: She explained herself casually and without a hint of guilt.

LABEL: 0x7510
STRING: She didn't seem to be joking or lying.

LABEL: 0x7550
STRING: ...Sure, her calculation of the year might be correct...

LABEL: 0x75C8
STRING: But, seven years.

LABEL: 0x75E8
STRING: Did she really go through seven years without hearing about it?

LABEL: 0x763A
STRING: She may have been holed up in her lab, but surely she left there at some point.

LABEL: 0x7694
STRING: Did no one going in or out of the laboratory have any knowledge of the tragedy?

LABEL: 0x76E0
STRING: After the "Fourth Day," the world changed like it was sliding down a hill.

LABEL: 0x7728
STRING: It may not have been a big change at first glance...

LABEL: 0x776E
STRING: However, a world that had been torn and mended, like sewing up a small tear, wasn't really the same as it originally was.

LABEL: 0x7864
STRING: And... there was one more thing that bothered me.

LABEL: 0x7898
STRING: Seven years ago was exactly the time that Tokiwa had disappeared from the public eye.

LABEL: 0x7961
STRING: She was a girl who had made waves with her words, deeds, and accomplishments, year after year,

LABEL: 0x7999
STRING: or, for that matter, month after month.

LABEL: 0x79D1
STRING: There was no one who didn't recognize the name Saihouji Tokiwa at the time.

LABEL: 0x7A0D
STRING: Nevertheless, one day she suddenly disappeared from the media.

LABEL: 0x7A55
STRING: It was said she was devoting herself to her research, but that wasn't the case.

LABEL: 0x7A91
STRING: She had disappeared from the academic community as well, not just from the general public.

LABEL: 0x7AD1
STRING: A number of rumors were flying around at that time.

LABEL: 0x7AFF
STRING: That she had been nothing more than a puppet from the start.

LABEL: 0x7B2F
STRING: Or, that perhaps she had lost her talent with age.

LABEL: 0x7B5B
STRING: Or, that she might have been hospitalized due to insanity.

LABEL: 0x7BF5
STRING: Or, that she had died in the Aqualine accident.

LABEL: 0x7D9C
STRING: 「You can't talk about things you don't know.」

LABEL: 0x7DD6
STRING: 「You can only be silent about the unspeakable.」

LABEL: 0x7E1A
STRING: 「So, I must know.」

LABEL: 0x7E7E
STRING: Yukari's words trailed off at her sudden appeal.

LABEL: 0x7EB4
STRING: She had a hard time coming up with a response and looked to Hiragino for help.

LABEL: 0x7F2A
STRING: I followed her gaze, and when I looked at him, he looked very pained.

LABEL: 0x7F74
STRING: Hiragino stood in place with a pale face as if he wasn't feeling well.

LABEL: 0x7FBA
STRING: That's right...

LABEL: 0x7FD6
STRING: He'd been staring at the <Isle of Wind> as we left the port.

LABEL: 0x8042
STRING: Yukari kept quiet.

LABEL: 0x805E
STRING: No one wanted to speak up.

LABEL: 0x8084
STRING: About the tragedy seven years ago――

LABEL: 0x80D3
STRING: 「...It's all in the past now.」

LABEL: 0x8156
STRING: 「April 4th, 2026.」

LABEL: 0x8174
STRING: 「The astronomical event that occurred that day―Betelgeuse's supernova explosion.」

LABEL: 0x81C2
STRING: 「It gave birth to a great tragedy.」

LABEL: 0x81FB
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei...」

LABEL: 0x8228
STRING: 「Everyone knows about it... What's there to be shocked about now?」

LABEL: 0x828B
STRING: 「But, you...」

LABEL: 0x82BC
STRING: 「Don't worry about me.」

LABEL: 0x8337
STRING: 「...Let me tell you about what happened.」

LABEL: 0x8364
STRING: Hiragino put a hand on Yukari's shoulder and tried to convince her with a pale face.

LABEL: 0x839C
STRING: He didn't look well at all.

LABEL: 0x83CE
STRING: But... I could see a light in his eyes.

LABEL: 0x83FC
STRING: It was as if he was trying to settle something by talking about it himself.

LABEL: 0x84AC
STRING: 「The supernova explosion... and the accident it led to.」

LABEL: 0x84DC
STRING: 「The location was the Aqualine at Kurama Bay.」

LABEL: 0x850A
STRING: 「Either blinded by the light or distracted by it... one car crashed into the one in front of it.」

LABEL: 0x856B
STRING: Such a trivial trigger――

LABEL: 0x861D
STRING: 「That's when the terrible multi-collision accident happened.」

LABEL: 0x8651
STRING: 「I was a medical intern at the time, but I was also caught in that accident.」

LABEL: 0x8695
STRING: 「Fortunately, I was only lightly injured, so I looked to rescuing others immediately.」

LABEL: 0x86D5
STRING: 「I, myself, was...」

LABEL: 0x872D
STRING: 「They were short on disaster triage personnel, so I helped with that.」

LABEL: 0x8781
STRING: 「...I still remember what I saw back then.」

LABEL: 0x885B
STRING: 「A burning bridge――」

LABEL: 0x887B
STRING: 「Giant flames rising toward the heavens.」

LABEL: 0x88C1
STRING: 「...It was the worst accident I had ever seen.」

LABEL: 0x88F7
STRING: 「Everyone, from adults to children, were caught up in it――」

LABEL: 0x8940
STRING: 「...So, you were there too.」

LABEL: 0x8979
STRING: He "too"――

LABEL: 0x8999
STRING: The "Fourth Day," the Aqualine accident...

LABEL: 0x89C3
STRING: Hundreds of people were caught up in it.

LABEL: 0x89F1
STRING: I see... So she was there as well.

LABEL: 0x8B79
STRING: 「We saw it too. That scene.」

LABEL: 0x8BA5
STRING: 「It's still burned into my mind and won't disappear...」

LABEL: 0x8BEA
STRING: 「...I see. So you were a victim as well.」

LABEL: 0x8C1A
STRING: 「Could it be that Reiri-kun's injuries are――」

LABEL: 0x8C51
STRING: Reiri's injuries?

LABEL: 0x8CF5
STRING: Something besides her strangulation marks...?

LABEL: 0x8D36
STRING: 「I see. So the doctor saw it.」

LABEL: 0x8DBD
STRING: 「I lost my right arm because of that accident.」

LABEL: 0x8E04
STRING: Her right arm...?

LABEL: 0x8E1E
STRING: I took another serious look at her arm, which had been a natural part of her appearance until then.

LABEL: 0x8E68
STRING: ...It looked like a normal arm, but was it a prosthetic――

LABEL: 0x8EAA
STRING: Avoiding my gaze, Reiri caressed her right arm with her left.

LABEL: 0x8F56
STRING: 「My arm doesn't matter.」

LABEL: 0x8F86
STRING: 「It's not a tragedy or anything.」

LABEL: 0x8FAA
STRING: 「The tragedy was something else.」

LABEL: 0x8FD8
STRING: 「――That day, our Mother died.」

LABEL: 0x9009
STRING: Touri's and Reiri's mother...

LABEL: 0x90AC
STRING: At the time...

LABEL: 0x90C0
STRING: The two of them were barely ten years old.

LABEL: 0x90E6
STRING: They had lost their mother right in front of their eyes in the blazing flames――

LABEL: 0x9293
STRING: 「Sorry... I made you remember something painful.」

LABEL: 0x9333
STRING: 「Isn't it the same for you as well?」

LABEL: 0x935A
STRING: Reiri responded in a cynical tone.

LABEL: 0x9386
STRING: Hiragino gave a small nod.

LABEL: 0x941E
STRING: 「The accident was brought under control by the end of the day.」

LABEL: 0x9454
STRING: 「During it all, Betelgeuse continued to shine.」

LABEL: 0x9488
STRING: 「...Like a second sun in the night sky.」

LABEL: 0x94BC
STRING: 「It was some time after the accident...」

LABEL: 0x94EE
STRING: 「That people started to refer to that day, that tragedy, after the Bible.」

LABEL: 0x9546
STRING: 「The "Fourth Day"――」

LABEL: 0x95F9
STRING: And God said――

LABEL: 0x9617
STRING: 「Let there be lights in the expanse of the heavens to separate the day from the night.」

LABEL: Split3
STRING: 「And let them be for signs and for seasons, and for days and years, and let them be lights in the expanse of the heavens to give light upon the earth.」

LABEL: 0x967E
STRING: And it was so.

LABEL: 0x96FB
STRING: And God made the two great lights.

LABEL: 0x9726
STRING: The greater light to rule the day and the lesser light to rule the night―and the stars.

LABEL: 0x976E
STRING: And God set them in the expanse of the heavens to give light on the earth, to rule over the day and over the night, and to separate the light from the darkness.

LABEL: 0x97C9
STRING: And God saw that it was good.

LABEL: 0x97EF
STRING: And there was evening and there was morning,

LABEL: 0x9872
STRING: the fourth day――

LABEL: 0x98A1
STRING: 「The "Fourth Day" took everything

LABEL: 0x98D3
STRING: from us.」

LABEL: 0x98F6
STRING: From us――

LABEL: 0x9910
STRING: The scope of her words wasn't limited to the two sisters.

LABEL: 0x99EC
STRING: They encompassed everyone who'd been there.

LABEL: 0x9A1E
STRING: Yes.

LABEL: 0x9A34
STRING: If the "Fourth Day" hadn't come...

LABEL: 0x9A5E
STRING: <COOS> wouldn't have sunk into the sea.

LABEL: 0x9A8E
STRING: My sister wouldn't have had an accident on board the <SHEEP>.

LABEL: 0x9ACD
STRING: We had all been robbed in equal measure――

LABEL: 0x9B6D
STRING: 「...Thank you for telling me.」

LABEL: 0x9B9B
STRING: 「I understand most of what you're saying.」

LABEL: 0x9BC7
STRING: 「――If what Reiri-san said is true, then a similar phenomenon is happening right now...」

LABEL: 0x9C32
STRING: 「I can't say for sure that it's the same.」

LABEL: 0x9C60
STRING: 「However, a major astronomical event has affected the surface, making it impossible to deal with submarines and the like.」

LABEL: 0x9D3C
STRING: 「I see.」

LABEL: 0x9D75
STRING: Tokiwa whispered quietly and looked up toward the sky.

LABEL: 0x9DA7
STRING: The only thing you could see was the black ceiling.

LABEL: 0x9DCF
STRING: But she could see it―the countless information maps constructed in her brain.

LABEL: 0x9E32
STRING: 「...As far as I can recall, there are only a limited number of major astronomical events that can occur at this time of year.」

LABEL: 0x9EA8
STRING: 「A meteor strike, for example.」

LABEL: 0x9ED2
STRING: 「...But that's not likely. It would've been predicted at least a few days ago.」

LABEL: 0x9F2E
STRING: 「There's almost no astronomical activity that cannot be predicted in advance with today's observational technology.」

LABEL: 0x9F8B
STRING: Tokiwa searched around for a clue.

LABEL: 0x9FCF
STRING: She looked at the faces of everyone present and then down at the control panel.

LABEL: 0xA087
STRING: 「If the lack of communication is not a deliberate blockage on the surface...」

LABEL: 0xA0DF
STRING: 「...It's possible that a satellite could break down because of a gamma-ray burst from a supernova explosion.」

LABEL: 0xA12F
STRING: 「But, Betelgeuse is no longer there, is it?」

LABEL: 0xA172
STRING: Yes―Betelgeuse had already exploded.

LABEL: 0xA1AA
STRING: Nodding, Tokiwa slowly raised her head.

LABEL: 0xA1EC
STRING: She faced Reiri directly.

LABEL: 0xA2D7
STRING: 「Then, as I thought――」

LABEL: 0xA2F9
STRING: 「There's only one thing I can think of.」

LABEL: 0xA330
STRING: 「Exactly.」

LABEL: 0xA35B
STRING: 「A large-scale astronomical event, similar to a supernova explosion, with severe effects on communication equipment...」

LABEL: 0xA3BB
STRING: 「And, an extremely difficult one to predict despite that...」

LABEL: 0xA3F7
STRING: 「――A super flare.」

LABEL: 0xA424
STRING: 「Super flare...」

LABEL: 0xA448
STRING: It was an unfamiliar word.

LABEL: 0xA46A
STRING: I looked to my side and saw Touri tilting her head as well.

LABEL: 0xA50E
STRING: 「A flare is an explosion phenomenon in which the energy of the magnetic field stored in a sunspot is released all at once,

LABEL: 0xA574
STRING: releasing a destructive amount of particles from the sun.」

LABEL: 0xA5C0
STRING: 「When a large number of these particles collide and enter the Earth's magnetosphere,

LABEL: 0xA61C
STRING: a huge magnetic storm is triggered, causing communication system failures and massive power outages.」

LABEL: 0xA668
STRING: 「If I remember right, there was one in March 1989――」

LABEL: 0xA69F
STRING: 「A massive power outage caused by a flare hit the province of Quebec in Canada, affecting six million people.」

LABEL: 0xA711
STRING: 「Six million...」

LABEL: 0xA766
STRING: A power outage accompanied by a communication system malfunction would affect all people living in the area.

LABEL: 0xA7C6
STRING: Six million sounded small...

LABEL: 0xA7F1
STRING: For example, if the same phenomenon were to occur in Tokyo, the damage would be――

LABEL: 0xA83B
STRING: Just thinking about it was terrifying.

LABEL: 0xA8CD
STRING: 「Just like earthquakes, the more energy there is, the lower the frequency of the flare.」

LABEL: 0xA92B
STRING: 「The Carrington flare of 1859, the largest in recorded history, occurs only once every few decades...」

LABEL: 0xA990
STRING: 「If a flare were to be even bigger than that, then the frequency would be... unknown.」

LABEL: 0xA9D8
STRING: 「The damage that would occur if a Carrington flare were to hit the Earth today would be nothing compared to what it once was.」

LABEL: 0xAA44
STRING: 「Satellites, ground-based power generators, and transmission systems would likely be severely damaged,

LABEL: 0xAA9A
STRING: broadcasting and GPS would be disabled, and major power outages would occur, wreaking havoc on our lives...」

LABEL: 0xABCE
STRING: 「As with the gamma-ray burst on the "Fourth Day,"

LABEL: 0xAC0C
STRING: as civilization becomes more advanced, so too does it become more vulnerable to flares.」

LABEL: 0xACB5
STRING: 「I don't know if you know this, Tokiwa-san... but that was also the reason why the construction of the <Isle of Wind> was rushed...」

LABEL: 0xAD2A
STRING: However, the people on the surface would be helpless if a super flare were to hit them directly――

LABEL: 0xAD80
STRING: 「Once every few decades... Do flares really create that kind of damage every few decades?」

LABEL: 0xADED
STRING: 「The particles released will not hit Earth every time, of course.」

LABEL: 0xAE43
STRING: 「Even if a flare occurs once every few decades, Earth will not be damaged that often.」

LABEL: 0xAEA4
STRING: 「However, if we're unlucky enough to get hit――」

LABEL: 0xAEDD
STRING: The damage it would cause would be unimaginable.

LABEL: 0xAF3F
STRING: How many years had it been since personal PDAs became widespread?

LABEL: 0xAF72
STRING: Social systems were already built on the assumption that they would be used.

LABEL: 0xAFBA
STRING: It was an easy world to live in, depending on if you had them or not.

LABEL: 0xAFFA
STRING: And also the reason it could crumble so easily――

LABEL: 0xB105
STRING: 「So, a super flare of such magnitude that its frequency is unknown just happened to hit the Earth directly

LABEL: 0xB171
STRING: just as the <SHEEP III> was diving?」

LABEL: 0xB1DF
STRING: 「Yeah, that's what it seems like.」

LABEL: 0xB271
STRING: 「――How is a coincidence like that...」

LABEL: 0xB293
STRING: 「It's impossible!」

LABEL: 0xB33C
STRING: Yukari held her head in her hands.

LABEL: 0xB35A
STRING: She couldn't understand―no, she didn't want to.

LABEL: 0xB3FA
STRING: 「How does something like that happen "naturally," without any human intervention...?」

LABEL: 0xB452
STRING: 「――It's supernatural.」

LABEL: 0xB47F
STRING: 「...Supernatural coincidences and the supernatural are two different things.」

LABEL: 0xB510
STRING: 「But yes, you're right.」

LABEL: 0xB53C
STRING: 「As you said, the more advanced technology becomes, the more vulnerable society becomes to astronomical disasters.」

LABEL: 0xB5A6
STRING: 「If the "Fourth Day" is being repeated on the surface...」

LABEL: 0xB5E6
STRING: 「...I don't think we're going to get rescued.」

LABEL: 0xB62D
STRING: We couldn't communicate with the surface.

LABEL: 0xB64B
STRING: No rescue would come.

LABEL: 0xB667
STRING: Within a few hours, this deep-sea cage, from which escape was seemingly imminent, was once again shut tightly.

LABEL: 0xB6D0
STRING: 「But... the people at ROMLES know that the <SHEEP III> is seeking help, right?」

LABEL: 0xB739
STRING: 「If that's the case, then maybe――」

LABEL: 0xB784
STRING: 「There's no "maybe."」

LABEL: 0xB7AE
STRING: 「Mom, who was not supposed to be saved, is dead.」

LABEL: 0xB7EA
STRING: 「The same thing is happening here.」

LABEL: 0xB844
STRING: Reiri dismissed her sister's attempt to cling to hope.

LABEL: 0xB87C
STRING: It had been decided that we shouldn't be saved―that was what she meant.

LABEL: 0xB8B4
STRING: In the field of disaster relief, it wasn't possible to give medical treatment to all patients.

LABEL: 0xB9D8
STRING: 「They lend a hand to those who have the highest probability of being saved...」

LABEL: 0xBA18
STRING: 「Triaging lives―you're used to that, aren't you, doctor?」

LABEL: 0xBA6D
STRING: 「Reiri-kun...」

LABEL: 0xBA8E
STRING: The selection between the living and the dead took place when it was clear

LABEL: 0xBAD0
STRING: that you couldn't save everyone.

LABEL: 0xBAFA
STRING: That selection was made based on the efficiency of rescue――

LABEL: 0xBB2C
STRING: It was a cold principle laid out in the name of the greatest happiness

LABEL: 0xBB4E
STRING: to the largest number of people.

LABEL: 0xBC2F
STRING: 「This ship――

LABEL: 0xBC46
STRING: has been triaged.」
